H0.text: What colour is the cross on the national flag of Denmark. Red

H1.text: What colour is the cross on the national flag of Denmark. Blue

H2.text: What colour is the cross on the national flag of Denmark. Yellow

H3.text: What colour is the cross on the national flag of Denmark. White

A4.text: The flag is red with a white Nordic cross.

A5.text: The white cross must be 1‚ÅÑ7 of the flag's height.
